metadata.title: CVE-2021-40608 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: The gf_hinter_track_finalize function in GPAC 1.0.1 allows attackers tocause a denial of service via a crafted file in the MP4Box command.

criterions.comment: gpac: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
